attributes.action: take disciplinary action towards jeremy clarkson for racism
attributes.additional_details:
Jeremy clarkson has been racist towards other ethnicity and religion for a very long time and this has to stop he has now used the word 'n****r' which is just unacceptable
I am a white british and enjoy the multi cultural aspect of britain and no one has the right to use or be racial towards anyone
Something has to be done
